data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Mail::Procmail was already taken, but fortunately makes my name
    more descriptive of what it really is: a procmail rc parser.
    Mail::Procmailrc parses bona fide procmail rc files and puts the
    contents into an object for manipulation. There is currently nothing
    of the sort on CPAN (despite some similar names).
